about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Hi, I’m Duda
about.description:
I'm a Full Stack Developer with 3 years of experience in frontend and backend using Flutter, Vue.js, and Node.js. I'm passionate about building impactful solutions with clean code and great user experience.

I'm currently looking for remote opportunities to join international teams, grow professionally, and contribute to meaningful digital products.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work and personal projects

cartoesFacil.title: Easy Cards
cartoesFacil.subtitle: Credit card comparison app
cartoesFacil.description: Participated as a collaborator in the development of Easy Cards, contributing with improvements and implementations on the frontend. I helped create reusable visual components, responsiveness, and navigation experience refinement, applying UI/UX best practices.

jogoBiblia.title: Bible Quiz: Daily Study
jogoBiblia.subtitle: Biblical quiz app with gamification
jogoBiblia.description: Performed app updates focusing on performance, stability, and advertising integration. I optimized the monetization system (AdMob) and contributed with layout adjustments and user experience improvements.

caloTrack.title: CaloTrack: Calorie Monitor
caloTrack.subtitle: Nutrition app with AI for food analysis and personalized planning
caloTrack.description: I developed the entire app frontend and implemented AI integration for image analysis and personalized plan generation. I created features like nutritional goals, charts, food diary, water intake, and intelligent recommendation system.

enemNinja.title: Enem Ninja
enemNinja.subtitle: Educational app with simulators and gamification for ENEM
enemNinja.description: Developed entirely by me, from design to programming. I created interactive simulators, scoring system, progress tracking, and a content library focused on performance and engagement for ENEM students.

zapFacil.title: EasyZap
zapFacil.subtitle: Dashboard for WhatsApp Business message automation
zapFacil.description: I was responsible for developing the administrative dashboard using Vue.js. The interface allows configuration and monitoring of automated message campaigns, focusing on clarity, organization, and responsiveness.

gerenciaMei.title: ManageMEI
gerenciaMei.subtitle: Simplified management platform for individual microentrepreneurs
gerenciaMei.description: I contributed to creating the main screens and app flows, working in a team focusing on financial organization, document issuance, and data visualization. I worked on alignment between frontend, backend, and design.

snaprix.description: Addictive Tetris-style mobile game developed with Flutter

playlistPorter.description: Responsive landing page for playlist transfers between platforms
